title: New client.
body: It won't let me download the new client. But when I try the option to download the new client isn't there. So when I exit out to play the game I never get to the login screen. I've tried re-installing the game and that hasn't worked. Any suggestions?

replies.body:
It sounds like there's something going on between your PC and our servers that are preventing you from reaching certain parts of the League platform. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are configured properly for League.

Let me know if you run into further issues after taking those steps.
